name: Liam Riley Changing of Seasons, Space, Revenge Racing
name_original: Liam Riley Changing of Seasons, Space, Revenge Racing
description:
Changing of Season - Click the screen to visualise the different seasons and their colours

Space - Survive as long as possible before your fuel runs out or you die.

Revenge Racing - Game 1 is a racing game where you verse a cheating opponent. Game 2 has to levels where you traverse moving platforms before the red consumes the screen.
